segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that one task, a picture of domestic routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water, running freely from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just running; the sink is completely overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the cabinets and onto the floor in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be standing in a puddle right now, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of what's happening around them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is clearly submerged in the growing pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how calm she appears, given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water will soon be everywhere, damaging everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This oversight seems almost impossible to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR
